name: Copenhagen Residential Collateral SPV â€” Series 1
description: This SPV finances the acquisition of residential land and construction of housing units in Copenhagen. Investor capital is secured by first-ranking collateral over the underlying real estate. Rental and/or sale proceeds are distributed to certificate holders.

attributes.value: Secured claim on real estate collateral and revenue distributions
Residential land and housing units in Copenhagen
Rental income and/or property sale proceeds
